name: ai-시험지-생성기
description: AI 시험지 생성기 - 수학 문제와 해설이 포함된 시험지를 생성하는 도구

scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.build:win: npm run build && npx pkg server.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output release/ai-exam-generator.exe
scripts.build:mac: npm run build && npx pkg server.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --output release/ai-exam-generator-mac
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && npx pkg server.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output release/ai-exam-generator-linux
scripts.dist: npm run build && npx pkg server.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output release/ai-exam-generator.exe
